title: Person Of Interest || Root and Shaw || Desire
author: Fluffer Nutter
comment: Why are the toxic relationships in movies and series always the hottest 🤣

I miss these two so much, they were both so bat shit crazy they are the only ones who could love each other and there’s no question that they did. Shaw’s line as she’s talking to Root, “You were my safe place” and Root just taking her in her arms. That my friends is love.
I love this video,Shaw and Root characters were so different but they co exist and compliment each other sweet and fun to watch...
I will never get over roots death like a part of me died with her it was not okay

I loved and admired Root so much, and I don’t think I will ever forget her. She was one of the first fictional characters I grew really attached to. The ending definitely broke me, but while this show might be over, Root will always have a special place in my heart.
description:
Just Root and Shaw being Root and Shaw.

Tv show: Person Of Interest
Music: Desire by Meg Myers
